item.description:
A rational person should be optimistic about the future.
In every era pessimists have been vastly more popular than optimists. Yet almost every single pessimistic prediction for thousands of years has been wrong.
Find out why, when I present the book by Matt Ridley. Discussion to follow.

[On weekends cheap parking is available in the BU Babcock St lot. Babcock St stop on the Green B line is very close.]
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Free State Project T-shirt

group.name: The Boston Ayn Rand Meetup Group

item.name: Salon - Rational Optimist
